message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think you'll love it!
I'm interested in the product, but $200 is a bit out of my budget. Would you be willing to consider a lower price?
I understand your concern about the price, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway. Would you consider $175 for the product?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit short on budget. Would you be willing to consider $160?
I understand your budget constraints, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. Would you consider $170 for the product?
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm still a bit short on budget. Would you be willing to consider $165?
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. Would you consider $168 for the product?
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'm willing to meet you at $165, but no higher. Would you be willing to accept this price?
